id_table_1.caption: Baseline performance on test set of Logic2Text (L2T) and Logical Counterfactual Data (LCD). Dec denotes the relative decrease on LCD compared with L2T.

id_table_2.caption: Results of different methods on L2T and LCD with respect to BLEC, BLEC* and human evaluation.
